has research problem.from sentence: Data and text mining BioBERT : a pre-trained biomedical language representation model for biomedical text mining

has research problem: extracting valuable information from biomedical literature

has research problem.from sentence: With the progress in natural language processing ( NLP ) , extracting valuable information from biomedical literature has gained popularity among researchers , and deep learning has boosted the development of effective biomedical text mining models .

has research problem: pre-trained language model BERT can be adapted for biomedical corpora

has research problem.from sentence: In this article , we investigate how the recently introduced pre-trained language model BERT can be adapted for biomedical corpora .

has research problem: biomedical text mining often yields unsatisfactory results due to a word distribution shift from general domain corpora to biomedical corpora

has research problem.from sentence: However , directly applying the advancements in NLP to biomedical text mining often yields unsatisfactory results due to a word distribution shift from general domain corpora to biomedical corpora .

has research problem: word distributions of general and biomedical corpora are quite different

has research problem.from sentence: Also , the word distributions of general and biomedical corpora are quite different , which can often be a problem for biomedical text mining models .
